PreceptDef.label: disliked
PreceptDef.description: Creep is disgusting. We have to tolerate it if we want to create our own insectoid hive, but the less we have to experience its stench, the better.

PreceptDef.label: don't care
PreceptDef.description:
Creep is disgusting, but we have to tolerate it if we want to create our own insectoid hive.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Insectoid creep will now have a beauty of 0.

PreceptDef.label: sublime
PreceptDef.description:
We will fully embrace our insectoid brethren and bathe in the magnificence of their excretions.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Insectoid creep will now have a beauty of 3.
